description:
3/8" horiz. strips of leather woven alternately with smooth and split side of hide on face. Blk warp. 3/8"-1/2" strips shiny & dull blk leather and/or vinyl separated by blk threads form weft. Stapled to 11x8.5" card with 99.1.1012.24 which is slightly differnt.  
"H-3", "Leather Cloth H.W." and JLL's address card all on face. (black)
title: Leather Cloth
